Description: Generates Blazor CRUD pages given a model.

Arguments.Name: templateName
Arguments.Description: The template to use. Supported view templates: 'Empty|Create|Edit|Delete|Details|List|CRUD'

Options.Name: relativeFolderPath
Options.Description: Specify the relative output folder path from project where the file needs to be generated, if not specified, file will be generated in the project folder

Options.Name: namespaceName
Options.Description: Specify the name of the namespace to use for the generated Endpoints file

Options.Name: databaseProvider
Options.Description: Database provider to use. Options include 'sqlserver' (default), 'sqlite', 'cosmos', 'postgres'.
